findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The 'transfer' function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential malicious activities.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have proper access control or validation, allowing unauthorized users to increase allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is unprotected and can be exploited to mint tokens arbitrarily.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The internal _burn function lacks protection and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The internal function _beforeTokenTransfer lacks protection, potentially leading to unauthorized access or manipulation of token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected _afterTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The internal function _afterTokenTransfer does not have proper access control, potentially allowing unauthorized modifications.
